subject: RE: [junit] Unknown Source?
msgSnippet: ... This is not a jUnit issue.  It is a java compilation issue.  You may be using a different compiler than in your past jobs.  Or you may be using the same
messageBody:
> I've used Junit in past jobs, and do not recall seeing this
> issue. I am running Junit under JDK1.31 on Windows and a
> Unix platform. In either case, when I get a failure's stack
> trace, I get "unknown source" for my java code, rather than a
> line number where one would expect it.
>
> I didn't catch this in the FAQ. Any ideas what I'm doing wrong?

This is not a jUnit issue. It is a java compilation issue. You may be
using a different compiler than in your past jobs. Or you may be using
the same compiler, but through different scripts!

Anyway, try setting the debug option ON for whichever compiler you are
using at the moment, see if that helps.

Manuel Amago.
